about_the_game:
Mission Statement

At One More World, Inc, our mission is to be the ultimate safeguard for planets in need. With our extraordinary team strategically scattered across the universe, we can swiftly confront and conquer any challenges that threaten planetary harmony. We take pride in our commitment to rescuing worlds from the clutches of chaos and the unknown. At One More World, Inc, saving planets isn't just a duty; it's a spirited voyage into the extraordinary realms of galactic rescue.

Job Description

Job Title: Galactic Quandary Solutions (Independent Contractor)
Location: Anywhere
Are you a spacefaring maverick with a knack for tackling the weirdest challenges the universe throws your way? Do you have a passion for problem-solving that's as vast as the cosmos itself? If so, One More World, Inc wants you! We're on the lookout for independent contractors to join our elite team of intergalactic troubleshooters. Strap in, because this isn't your average 9-to-5 job – it's a never ending adventure!

[h3]Key Responsibilities:[/h3]
Planetary Problem-Solving: Embark on thrilling missions to assist planets facing wildlife infestations, strange anomalies, invasions, zombie outbreaks, and other mind-boggling events.
Adaptability is Key: Be ready to confront the unknown. Whether it's battling extraterrestrial creatures or deciphering unknown anomalies, versatility and adaptability are your best friends.
Team Collaboration: Work closely with other independent contractors as part of your crew. Teamwork makes the dream work, especially when the dream involves saving planets from impending chaos.
Resourcefulness: Think on your feet and use your ingenuity and craftiness to overcome unexpected challenges. A makeshift blaster or a clever gadget might just be the solution the job needs.
Wit and Charm: Bring your unique personality to the table. We value quick quips, humor, and a charismatic presence – after all, saving the universe should be entertaining!
[h3]Qualifications:[/h3]
Interstellar Travel Experience: Must be comfortable navigating the universe. Piloting small spacecraft and larger capital ships, utilizing warp drives, and operating star maps are essential.
Basic Crafting: Must be able to use the resources available to you to craft items required to complete the job. Blueprints for specialty items may be provided in some situations.
Robot Operations: Experience with operating and maintaining robots is a must. When a job is too hard, there’s always a robot that can do it.
Combat Proficiency: Whether it's facing off against space zombies or warding off alien invasions, combat skills and familiarity with a variety of weaponry are a plus.
Adventurous Spirit: A love for the unknown and a sense of adventure are crucial. If you're excited about exploring uncharted territories, you're in the right place.
Problem-Solving Prowess: The ability to think creatively and solve problems under pressure is a must. Unpredictability is the only constant in the galactic landscape.
Sense of Humor: Laughter is the best defense against the absurdities you will encounter. A good sense of humor and the ability to entertain are highly valued.

content_descriptors.notes: In our game, players engage in combat with various creatures that require tactical shooting to defeat. The game contains depictions of violence, including intense combat sequences and graphic effects such as creature blood and dismemberment when creatures are hit.
